name: mmm-multiplayer-shooter
description: Multiplayer shooting game for web, Android, and iOS

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.mobile:android: cd client && npm run build && npx cap add android && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:ios: cd client && npm run build && npx cap add ios && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
